name: freeroam project
description:
In general, the game may not be worth the money and is provided free of charge, but further development depends on the support of the author from the players.

This is the first release, one of these days there will be the next versions and then everything depends on you

You can download for free from the mega.nz file hosting service, you can download from here, paying only $ 1 (this is the minimum price available on this site) and you will receive the latest updates and support.

I will listen to any wishes regarding the development of the game.
